name: vue-svg-wrapper-automation
description: Create a vue svg wrapper from your clipboard.

vueSvgWrapper.defaultDirectory.description: The .vue file will be generated inside this directory. The workspace root is used by default (Empty value). You can set a path relative to your workspace root (eg. assets/icons/).

vueSvgWrapper.useCompositionApi.description: Will generate a composition api or options api component.

vueSvgWrapper.customTemplate.description: Custom Vue template to use. Use {{SVG_CONTENT}} as placeholder for the SVG content and {{COMPONENT_NAME}} for the component name. Leave empty to use default template.

vueSvgWrapper.allowDownloadWithHTTPS.description: Allow downloading SVGs from HTTPS URLs. When disabled, only clipboard content will be used.
